title: Surging Nets stay hot behind KD and Kyrie
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss this weekend’s end to the NBA’s regular seasons; now all eyes are turn to the play-in game. The East have a favorite in the Brooklyn Nets, and the West have the rejuvenated Los Angeles Clippers. Could a surprise team make noise in the playoffs? Shout out Joel Embiid for securing the scoring title. Find out what this means for the 76ers as they head into a first-round matchup with the Toronto Raptors. Luka gets injured in the last game of the season. Find out if this means a first-round exit for the Dallas Mavericks. Plus, what bet has Jacoby all negative on Monday morning? Let’s just say that “easy money” became a bad beat. All that and more… 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
